<div class="doctest-section">

<h3 class="doctest-section-pyname>Creating a Log Entry</h3>

Creating a log entry

>>> from loggrok.log import LogEntry, LogHeader
>>> message = 'This is a message'
>>> header = '2005-11-22 12:00:00,346 ERROR '
>>> log_header = LogHeader(header)
>>> entry = LogEntry(log_header, message)
>>> print entry.message
This is a message
>>> print entry.header
2005-11-22 12:00:00,346 ERROR 

Entries are represented by their messages:

>>> print entry
This is a message
    
</div>
